Title: Urgent Computer Issue Resolution Guide: Saving Your Business

Introduction:
Dear [Friend's Name],

I understand the critical situation you're facing with your computer, and I'm here to help you resolve it. Your livelihood is at stake, and I want to assure you that we will do everything possible to save your business. Although you mentioned 'hacking,' let's focus on resolving the complex issue you're experiencing. Time is of the essence, so let's get started immediately.
